page.title: 12LAW AND ORDER
page.content: TRAFFIC CONTROL during the last five years more up to date equipment has become available to the force e.g. radar guns.The best part of the job is "helping motorists in their day to day business". The worst part of the job is "trying to console the parents and relatives of someone who has been badly injured or killed in an RTA": QUALIFICATIONS "O" and "A"levels help but all candidates have to pass an entrance examination. PROMOTION every officer begins as a PC,and have to pass an exam to become a sergeant.The next step is to take an Inspectors exam and further promotion is based on recommendation. EQUAL OPPORTUNITIES men and women have an equal chance in the police force. CRIME RATE has increased in the last 5 years. More men are on the beat and in Bath the detection rate is the best UK
